EmailTemplate.name: Webinar - Product - Model-based Test Automation - EMEA.Invite - 1 Week
EmailTemplate.subject: Tricentis Tosca Testsuite Webinar and Demo: Accelerate Business Innovation
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {{lead.First Name}},
Though test automation technology has been around for 40 years, only 15% of regression tests are automated.
For organizations under constant pressure to speed time to value and meet the growing expectations of customers and partners, this slow rate of automation is clearly not acceptable.
In this short webinar, see a demo of Tosca Testsuite and learn more about these topics:
- Automated testing and how it can speed time to value for your company - Leveraging the knowledge of business testers to automate test cases - Model-based testing and the use of modules in Tosca Testsuite
The Tricentis Webinar Team
<http://innovate.tricentis.com/webinar-model-based-test-automation-emea.html?utm_medium=email&utm_source=internal>
<http://innovate.tricentis.com/webinar-model-based-test-automation-emea.html?utm_medium=email&utm_source=internal> Wed. November 6, 2013
1:00pm – 2:00pm CET
Michael Niessl
Sales Support at Tricentis
Joshua Davis
Content Marketing Associate at Tricentis
